entries.meaning: (formal or humorous) Sexual intercourse, especially involving penile-vaginal penetration.
examples: Wolowitz:   Hang on. There really is a lady here?Leonard:   Uh-huh.Wolowitz:   And you want us out because you’re anticipating coitus?Leonard:   No, she’s just a friend.Wolowitz:   So she’s available for coitus?Leonard:   No, she’s – –
